conversation.message:
Dear Nursery_C Admissions Team,

Thank you for your note and for explaining the current review process.

As requested, here are our key constraints and flexibility:
- Start date: We can start immediately, and we are also flexible to start at any point in the next 1–8 weeks if that helps.
- Days/hours: We can accommodate any standard schedule you offer (full-time or part-time). We can also be flexible on specific days if needed.
- Paperwork: All documentation can be provided within 24 hours, and we can confirm acceptance the same day if offered.

Nursery_C remains our first choice. If at any point you are able to consider us for the available place, we are ready to proceed immediately.

Kind regards,
Parent_E
